ARJAVA Antti, Matias BUCHHOLZ and Traianos GAGOS, with contributions by Robert C. CALDWELL, Robert W. DANIEL, Ludwig KOENEN, Marjo LEHTINEN †, Mari MIKKOLA, Mari MUSTONEN, Tiina PUROLA, Erja SALMENKIVI, Marjaana VESTERINEN and Marja VIERROS, and plates prepared by Terrence SZYMANSKI and Vesa VAHTIKARI, The Petra Papyri. III. (American Center of Oriental Research Publications. 5.)
Amman, Jordan, American Center of Oriental Research, 2007, 4°, xxii-218 pp., tabl., 1 carte et 87 pll. ISBN 978-9957-8543-2-4. $100.

P. Petra III, 18-36. - P. Petra I, 2002 [No. 17 will be the subject of Volume II, in preparation]. - Preface and Acknowledgments (Barbara A. PORTER). - Foreword (A.A., M.B. and Tr.G.). - A Selection of Articles and Reports on the Petra Papyri 2002-2007. - Bibliography and Abbreviations. - Corrigenda in Volume I (A.A.). - P. Petra I 11 Addendum (M.V.). - Introduction: Physical Format and Notarial Conventions in the Petra Papyri (A.A.); - Calendars Used in the Petra Papyri (M.B.); - Updated Synoptic Chronological Table (A.A. and M.L.); - Updated Family Tree of Theodoros (A.A. and M.L.). - [Texts] 18-36. - Index (T.P.). - Introduction to the Plates (A.A. and M.B.). - Concordance.
